_header: Counsel is a thing needful and holy
_description: Take counsel — one stanza rhyme royal

CamTCC1137.First Lines:
Counsaile is a thing needfull & holyffor without it nothing can
                    prosper well…
CamTCC1137.Last Lines:
…shall never him of it repentof his time or troubell that he
                    therin hath spent
